overview: After a bike accident, Rahul finds shelter in a burnt-out house. The owner, Sekhar, comes to tell him that the house is haunted since his wife died in a fire there. Seeing that Rahul is sceptical, Sekhar tells Rahul three creepy stories to scare him., Sekhar tells Rahul three creepy stories to scare him.
title: Atanker Choya
